info.title: Navipartner API Vendors
info.description: These examples show how to use Navipartner Vendors API

200.description: Company information retrieved for all companies

get.description: Retrieve the specific company according to its ID.

200.description: Company information retrieved for one company

get.description: Retrieve the list of vendors associated with the specified company.

post.description: Create a new vendor for the specified company.

get.description: Retrieve the specified vendor from the company according to the vendor ID.

patch.description: Update the properties of the specified vendor from the company.

204.description: Vendor data has been updated successfully.

delete.description: Delete the specified vendor from the company.

204.description: The vendor has been deleted successfully.

get.description: Retrieve the currency of the specified vendor from the company.

patch.description: Update the currency of the specified vendor from the company.

204.description: Currency data has been updated successfully.

delete.description: Delete the currency of the specified vendor from the company.

204.description: Currency data has been deleted successfully.

get.description: Retrieve the default dimensions of the specified vendor from the company.

post.description: Create a new default dimension for the specified vendor from the company.

patch.operationId: Update the default dimension of the specified vendor from the company.

204.description: The default dimension has been updated successfully.

delete.description: Delete the default dimension of the specified vendor from the company.

204.description: The default dimension has been deleted successfully.

get.description: Retrieve the location of the specified vendor from the company.

patch.description: Update the location of the specified vendor from the company.

204.description: The location has been updated successfully.

delete.description: Delete the location of the specified vendor from the company.

204.description: The location has been deleted successfully.

get.description: Retrieve the payment method of the specified vendor from the company.

patch.description: Update the payment method of the specified vendor from the company.

204.description: The payment method has been updated successfully.

delete.description: Delete the payment method of the specified vendor from the company.

204.description: The payment method has been deleted successfully.

get.description: Retrieve the payment term of the specified vendor from the company.

patch.description: Update the payment term of the specified vendor from the company.

204.description: The payment term has been updated successfully.

delete.description: Delete the payment term of the specified vendor from the company.

204.description: The payment term has been deleted successfully.

get.description: Retrieve the properties of the picture for the specified vendor from the company.

200.description: The picture properties have been retrieved successfully.

patch.description: Update the properties of the picture for the specified vendor from the company.

204.description: The picture properties have been updated successfully.

delete.description: Delete the picture of the specified vendor from the company.

204.description: The picture has been deleted successfully.

get.description: Retrieve the media content of the picture for the specified vendor from the company.
Retrieve the salesperson/purchaser properties of the specified vendor from the company.

patch.description: Update the salesperson/purchaser properties of the specified vendor from the company.

204.description: The salesperson/purchaser has been updated successfully.

delete.description: Delete the salesperson/purchaser properties of the specified vendor from the company.

204.description: The salesperson/purchaser has been deleted successfully.

get.description: Retrieve the shipment method of the specified vendor from the company.

patch.description: Update the shipment method of the specified vendor from the company.

204.description: The shipment method has been updated successfully.

delete.description: Delete the shipment method of the specified vendor from the company.

204.description: The shipment method has been deleted successfully.

get.description: Retrieve the vendor bank account of the specified vendor from the company.

patch.description: Update the vendor bank account of the specified vendor from the company.

204.description: The vendor bank account has been updated successfully.

delete.description: Delete the vendor bank account of the specified vendor from the company.

204.description: The vendor back account has been deleted successfully.

get.description: Retrieve the vendor posting group of the specified vendor from the company.

patch.description: Update the vendor posting group of the specified vendor from the company.

204.description: The vendor posting group has been updated successfully.

delete.description: Delete the vendor posting group of the specified vendor from the company.

204.description: The vendor posting group has been deleted successfully.

get.description: Retrieve vendors from the default company.

post.description: Create a vendor in the default company.

get.description: Retrieve the vendor from the default company according to the vendor ID.

patch.description: Update the vendor in the default company.

204.description: The vendor has been updated successfully.

delete.description: Delete the vendor from the default company.

204.description: The vendor has been deleted successfully.

innererror.description: The structure of this object is service-specific

error.description: An error occured when sending the request

top.name: $top
top.description: Show only the first n items

tags.name: companies.company
tags.description: Use these endpoints to retrieve information about companies

tags.name: vendors.vendor
tags.description: A company is considered to be default if it's the only one in the system or if it is specified by the ServicesDefaultCompany setting on the server. If there are multiple companies in the system, and this setting is not defined, an error occurs.
